        public void addLocation(Location inLoc)
        Function will add push a new location to the end of an existing list of locations to form a route

        inLoc - The Location object that will be added to the listOfLocations ArrayList

      • modifyLocation

        public Location modifyLocation(Location inLoc,
                               java.lang.String name,
                               java.lang.String id,
                               GPSObject obj)
        Function will create a new Location object from the given parameters to replace a given Location
        Parameters:
        inLoc - The location that will be replaced by the new location
        name - The name of the new location
        id - The id of the new location
        obj - The latitude and longitude of the new object
        Returns:
        the newly created location
